metadata.title: CVE-2012-2146 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Elixir 0.8.0 uses Blowfish in CFB mode without constructing a uniqueinitialization vector (IV), which makes it easier for context-dependentusers to obtain sensitive information and decrypt the database.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2146` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-elixir - 0.7.1-4build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elixir package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.1-4build1').
